class_description:
This class implements a stream filter for reading compressed data in
 the GZIP file format.

Methods.method_description: Creates a new input stream with the specified buffer size.
Creates a new input stream with a default buffer size.

Closes this input stream and releases any system resources associated
 with the stream.

params.param_description: the buffer into which the data is read
the start offset in the destination array b
the maximum number of bytes read

return_description:
the actual number of bytes read, or -1 if the end of the
          compressed input stream is reached

Methods.method_description:
Reads uncompressed data into an array of bytes. If len is not
 zero, the method will block until some input can be decompressed; otherwise,
 no bytes are read and 0 is returned.
